Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Driver
    Main functional Method for Senate Simulator, containing the while loops
    that provide the game and repeating prompt functionality.
    Event
    Foreign Crisis and Events that will necessitate a response from the player
    Legislation
    Legislation proposed in the Senate that will be voted on in Driver.java, and determine if the user gets reelected.
    Others
    Overarching class for actors within the game, thus being a Super class to Player.java, Public.java, Senate.java, and State.java; provides the methods for the interactions between these classes and with Legislation and Event objects.
    Player
    Player object is subclass of Others.java; Players creates the object that
    the user directly controls and determines the interactions for within Driver.java
    Public
    Public would represent the US nation as a whole; There was not time to implement; Extends Others.
    Senate
    subClass of Others representing the US senate, to determine their specific votes and support for various pieces of legislation and the Player's actions
    State
    Subclass of Others, is the class that determines Player's reelection, and provides the instance variables to determine the why the Player should vote
